oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā kitāb ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-mursalīn jamʻ al-Shaykh al-ʻAllāmah al-Imām muḥaddith Bilād al-Shām Ismāʻīl al-Jarrāḥī al-shahīr bi-al-ʻAjlūnī : manuscript, 1849
Kitāb ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn
ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-mursalīn
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAjlūnī, Ismāʻīl ibn Muḥammad , 1676 or 1677-1748 or 1749
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: ʻAṭṭār, Muḥammad Najīb ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn Ḥāmid ibn Aḥmad (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Copy completed on 29 Shawwāl 1265 AH [September 17, 1849 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad Najīb ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd ibn Ḥāmid ibn Aḥmad al-ʻAṭṭār.
The text is followed by two short ijāzahs issued by Ḥasan ibn Ibrāhīm al-Bayṭār and Ḥasan ibn ʻUmar al-Shaṭṭī to Muḥammad Najīb ibn Muḥammad Saʻīd al-ʻAṭṭār.
MS Arab 219. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith
